MyWaypoint is a PrefabInstance (Transform.m_PrefabInstance=1633604867) under parent 'Waypoints'. It has BoxCollider id=65000011506705274 (enabled, m_IsTrigger=0) and Has_Event_Trigger=true, Has_Rigidbody=false, so Trigger action is valid. MonoBehaviour id=114000013353947326 in the scene meta is the settings for the attached Waypoint script (m_Script guid=18f754fc3d17b49db8e3d3dde994b993). Waypoint.Awake() uses GameObject.Find("Camera Holder") (GameObject id=241368711) to control camera holder during Approach/Occupancy. This action enters Focused state; Update() will invoke Focus().

Click to transition to Clicked; Update() will call Clicked(), then transition to Approaching when scaled threshold is met. In Approaching, Update() will call Hide() and Approach(), which in turn moves 'Camera Holder' to _initial_position + _cameraDisplacement and sets rotation to identity, triggering the Occupied state.
Re-enter focus to validate Enter() again after occupancy.
Exit from Focused state back to Idle to exercise Exit() transition. Note: Exit only applies when current state is Focused.

MyWaypoint (1) is a PrefabInstance (Transform.m_PrefabInstance=429518648) under parent 'Waypoints'. It has BoxCollider id=65000011506705274 (enabled, m_IsTrigger=0), Has_Event_Trigger=true, Has_Rigidbody=false, so a Trigger action is valid. MonoBehaviour id=114000013353947326 in the scene meta is the settings for the attached Waypoint script (m_Script guid=18f754fc3d17b49db8e3d3dde994b993) on this GameObject. Waypoint.Awake() instantiates the material, sets audio clip, caches initial position, and finds GameObject 'Camera Holder' (id=241368711). Enter() transitions Idle->Focused; Focus() will be called automatically in Update while in Focused.

Exit() only transitions Focused->Idle to avoid non-working clicks. This should be invoked after Enter() has set the state to Focused. The MonoBehaviour component (id=114000013353947326, script guid=18f754fc3d17b49db8e3d3dde994b993) is the attached Waypoint script settings.

Click() sets state to Clicked and plays audio (clip guid=a72739540860de04b8b0d8869e601e2e). In Update, Clicked() is applied automatically and when _scale >= scale_clicked_max*0.95 (scale_clicked_max=2, lerp_clicked=0.5), state transitions to Approaching. In Approaching, Hide() and Approach() are called automatically; Approach() moves 'Camera Holder' (id=241368711) to _initial_position + (0,0.7,0) and zeroes rotation. When cam.position equals that target, state transitions to Occupied and Hide() continues to apply. MonoBehaviour id=114000013353947326 corresponds to Waypoint script (guid=18f754fc3d17b49db8e3d3dde994b993).

Temple (GameObject fileID 259640721) has a child PrefabInstance (fileID 1781955274) with Door MonoBehaviour settings (MonoBehaviour id 1602679153). Script GUID 39f8a5a2b11c2426cb2a2bea3e825751 maps to class Door. This prefab has a Collider (component fileID 65000010208209682) with modified size x=14, y=10, z=0.1, enabling Trigger without Rigidbody. Initial Door state: locked=true, _state=Closed. Expect Open() to take fail path and PlaySound(open_fail_sound GUID b6a0517e9a9d14b7b8fd6be65f68f1a5).
Unlock the door to allow opening. MonoBehaviour id 1602679153 (Door). After this call: locked=false.

With locked=false and _state=Closed, calling Open should play open_success_sound (GUID e5a423fc890c5445fb9c3b126422891b), set _state=Opening, and slide door up by _slide_vector (0,1,0) at _slide_speed=2 until y reaches initial+7. Wait ~4s to reach Opened.

While _state=Opened (after previous action), invoke Open again to cover the 'cannot open' branch when not Closed. Expect PlaySound(open_fail_sound) and no movement. MonoBehaviour id 1602679153 (Door).

From Opened state, call Close to exercise closing branch: plays open_success_sound, sets _state=Closing, slides down until initial position. Code sets _state=Opened upon completion. Wait ~4s to complete motion. MonoBehaviour id 1602679153 (Door).

Temple child PrefabInstance (fileID 1781955274) has Door MonoBehaviour (script_fileID 1602679153) configured by scene MonoBehaviour component with Script GUID 39f8a5a2b11c2426cb2a2bea3e825751. Initial state: locked=true, _state=Closed. Call Open() to cover fail branch (plays open_fail_sound).
Unlock door for success branch. Door MonoBehaviour (script_fileID 1602679153).
With locked=false and _state=Closed, Open() should play open_success_sound and slide until Opened. Wait to complete motion.
Call Open() again in Opened state to cover 'cannot open' branch (plays open_fail_sound).
Close() from Opened state to exercise closing motion; plays open_success_sound; wait to reach initial position (state ends set to Opened by script).

Crystal MonoBehaviour (script_fileID 791898217, Script GUID 7ec1f4a241dbe3243aed64a4afbc8b66) is configured by scene MonoBehaviour component. Start() disables MeshCollider; MakeClickable() enables it for interaction.
Touch() plays greeting audio, sets _hide_dialog=false and _touched=true; wait for audio to end to allow dialog/speech bubble to show via Update().
First TakeCoins() while Coins still exist should activate dialog_fail branch. Crystal MonoBehaviour (script_fileID 791898217).

All Coins collected (FindGameObjectsWithTag("Coin").Length == 0). TakeCoins() should now activate dialog_teleport branch. Crystal MonoBehaviour (script_fileID 791898217).
Teleport(): sets audio clip to teleport_sound, plays it, sets _teleporting=true; Update() vibrates and after audio ends shows dialog_end and resets _teleporting.
Restart(): loads scene index 0 via SceneManager.LoadScene(0). Crystal MonoBehaviour (script_fileID 791898217).
